title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast - Mar 05 2020
itunes:title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast - Mar 05 2020
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1:

Mark Steyn guest hosts for Rush on Thursday. Fauxcahontas is out. Crazy Bernie is repeating the moment he lost the 2016 primary. There’s nothing to gain for Warren to support loser Sanders. Bernie will lose because he lacks Trump’s killer instinct. Moderate Dems are the bigger threat than a Ben & Jerry’s revolutionary. Schumer threatens Supreme Court justices. Cut to the chase and have a civil war. Real socialist thinks Bernie is a squish. Does Crazy Bernie really want to be president?

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2:

Warren beat up Bloomberg like Crowley beat up Romney. Hunter Biden’s drug policy. Chuck is walking back his threat to judges. The state of the Democrat primary. The collapse of the political adviser complex. Biden doesn’t have a mind of his own or anyone else’s. Whoever Biden picks as running mate is the true Dem candidate. Obama choreographed Sleepy Joe’s comeback. Politico: Biden could finish Bernie off by Michigan.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3:

Bernie angry about everything except when Dems rig primary. Pelosi withholds coronavirus funds until after Super Tuesday. Be calm and reasonable concerning the coronavirus. Trudeau suggests Iranian visitors self-quarantine. The hypocrisy of immigration health checks. It’s dangerous being heteroflexible, ask Chris Matthews. Trump’s win resulted in fewer boys born in Ontario. Rashida Tlaib doesn’t want you to have sex with her. Divisive identity politics has splintered the Dems. Man up, Bernie, or lose again.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
